quote: There is no such thing as digital marketing. There is marketing - most of which happens to be digital.
author: Brad Jakeman, the former president at PepsiCo

quote: Digital marketing is no longer about merely adding online channels to the media mix; it is about integrating digital into all facets of marketing.
author: Adam Bird, Senior Partner at McKinsey&Company
